subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Spain showed why it is favored to win the Under-20 World Cup, beating the United States, 4-1, in Istanbul on Friday behind two goals each from Jese and Gerard Deulofeu.
snippet: Spain showed why it is favored to win the Under-20 World Cup, beating the United States, 4-1, in Istanbul on Friday behind two goals each from Jese and Gerard Deulofeu.
